revised_title: On the Structure, Relations, and Development of the Nervous and Circulatory Systems in Myriapoda and Macrourous Arachnida
tldr: The author examines the structure, relations, and development of the nervous and circulatory systems in Myriapoda and Macrourous Arachnida, focusing on the minute anatomy of the nervous system and the existence of a complete system of circulatory vessels in these creatures.
